headline: Support Women Cardiologists
description: Help women build successful careers in cardiology by offering training, mentoring, and leadership programs through the ACC.

headline: Encourage More Women to Choose Cardiology
description: Improve training programs and show women residents the variety of career paths available in cardiology.

headline: Mentor Young Women
description: Create mentoring and preceptorship programs that inspire young women in high school, college, and medical school to consider cardiology as a career.

headline: Fairness for Women Cardiologists
description: Advocate fair treatment of women cardiologists, especially equal pay and chances to advance in their careers.
